# init

**Article**

Initializes a media item picker for all media types.

## Return Value

A new media item picker.

## Overview

The default media type for a media item picker is [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaType/any].

## Initializing a media item picker

- **init(mediaTypes:)**: Initializes a media item picker for specified media types.

items.description: Initializes a media item picker for specified media types.
items.name: init(mediaTypes:)
